allowStepClick.description: Set to false to disable clicks on step
allowStepClick.description_zh: 设置为 false 以禁用步骤上的单击

color.description: Key of theme.colors, by default controlled by Stepper component
color.description_zh: theme.colors 的 key，默认由 Stepper 组件控制

completedIcon.description: Step icon displayed when step is completed
completedIcon.description_zh: 步骤完成时显示的步骤图标

icon.description: Step icon, defaults to step index + 1 when rendered within Stepper
icon.description_zh: Step 图标，在 Stepper 中渲染时默认为步骤索引 + 1

iconPosition.description: Icon position relative to step body, controlled by Stepper component
iconPosition.description_zh: 图标相对于步骤主体的位置，由 Stepper 组件控制

label.description_zh: 步骤标签，在图标后渲染

loading.description: Indicates loading state of the step

progressIcon.description: Step icon displayed when step is in progress
progressIcon.description_zh: 步骤正在进行时显示的步骤图标

state.description: Step state, controlled by Stepper component
state.description_zh: Step 状态，由 Stepper 组件控制

step.description: Step index, controlled by Stepper component *
step.description_zh: 步长索引，由 Stepper 分量控制 *

withIcon.description: Determines whether the icon should be displayed
